Item.name: Door
Item.texte: What a beautiful door, and it seems so unbreakable!

activer.resultat: I would love to do it, but it is so damn locked!

observer.texte: Obviously i got to go through...

activer.texte: I could try to reach it!
activer.resultat: This is too high, i should have picked basket ball at college!

observer.texte: Oh I think i saw something into it!

action.resultat: Hey! Something fell on the ground!

observer.texte: It's a dark wood cane with a wolf head, so "chic"!
